afterSOLIDrevisionEHL.model

Interface Requestable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Book, BookCollection, CD, CDCollection, ComposedElement, DVD, DVDCollection, Element, SimpleElement

    public interface Requestable
    Interface that imposes operations of checking an setting the availability of elements that may be requested.
    Author:
    (original) Daniel Gomes, Filipe Maia, Pedro Antunes, (revisionSOLID) Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAvailable()
      Returns this element's availability.
      boolean isRequested()
      Returns this element's status regarding if it was requested or not from a shelf.
      void isRequested(boolean b)
      Sets this element's status concerning on whether it is or is not requested.
      void setAvailability(boolean b)
      Sets this element's status concerning on whether it is or is not available.

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Returns this element's availability.
        Returns:
        true if this is available for requesting;
        false if it is unavailable.

      • setAvailability

        void setAvailability(boolean b)
        Sets this element's status concerning on whether it is or is not available. If b is true, this element status changes to available; if b is false, this element is now unavailable.
        Parameters:
        b - The new availability status of this.

      • isRequested

        boolean isRequested()
        Returns this element's status regarding if it was requested or not from a shelf.
        Returns:
        true if this is requested;
        false if it's not.

      • isRequested

        void isRequested(boolean b)
        Sets this element's status concerning on whether it is or is not requested. If b is true, this element status changes to requested; if b is false, this element was now returned.
        Parameters:
        b - The new availability status of this.
